title: vaaNi varamaruL
sahitya:
vANi varam aruL kIravANi madhura
 
anupallavi
 
vINaiyin nAdamE uruvAna tAyE daraNi tanil kalai vaLara unaiyanri
yArammA

caraNam

veLLait-tAmaraiyilE vITriDum annaiyE vEdangaL pOTriDum nAyakiyE

kamban kavi bhAratiyum kavi pADa aruL sheida dEvi pATalIpura vAsan tudi
sheyyum
